titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce to age 21 the minimum age for an individual without children to be eligible for the earned income credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/7/2001--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce to 21 years old the minimum age for a person without children to qualify for the earned income credit.
